title: Sort Git Branches by Date (Challenge)
description: When working with Git, it's common to have multiple branches in a repository. However, it can be difficult to keep track of all the branches and their last commit dates. In this challenge, you will learn how to use Git to sort branches by date, making it easier to manage your repository.

meta.title: Sort Git Branches by Date (Challenge)
meta.description: Learn how to sort Git branches by date, making it easier to manage your repository.
